title: HOUR 3- Reggie Miller Sep 16, 2020
itunes:title: HOUR 3- Reggie Miller Sep 16, 2020
description:
Reggie Miller tells Dan that the Clippers bashing has been huge for losing again after having a 3 to 1 lead in the series against the Nuggets. Reggie says he is disappointed with the post conferences and the talk about how there was some division within the Clippers organization.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

content:encoded:
Reggie Miller tells Dan that the Clippers bashing has been huge for losing again after having a 3 to 1 lead in the series against the Nuggets. Reggie says he is disappointed with the post conferences and the talk about how there was some division within the Clippers organization.
